trans-unit.source: Aggregates a list of feeds into a page generated by a template;

trans-unit.source: Blog aggregation, static-website style!
trans-unit.target: Agregación de blogs,estilo de sitio web estático!

trans-unit.source: Blog aggregator plugin for Pelican
trans-unit.target: Plugin de agregador de blog para Pelican

trans-unit.source: By default all articles of a given feed are considered.
trans-unit.target: Por defecto se consideran todos los artículos de un determinado alimento.

trans-unit.source: By default the
trans-unit.target: Par défaut,la

trans-unit.source: By default, all articles from all feeds will be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: Por defecto,todos los artículos de todas las fuentes se añadirán a la página.

trans-unit.source: Displays the full articles, or just short summaries;

trans-unit.source: You can have more control on the generated page, by setting a few more options in your Pelican config file:

trans-unit.source: You’ll probably want to rebuild your website periodically though, maybe with a systemd timer or a cron job, to always fetch the latest articles in the feeds you aggregate.
trans-unit.target: You’ll probably want to rebuild your website periodically though, maybe with a systemd timer or a cron job, to always fetch the latest articles in the feeds you aggregate.
